content: असाधु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not good, bad, distasteful, unpleasant; अतोर्हसि क्षंतुमसाधु साधु वा <ls>Ki. 1. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Wicked. {@--3@} Illbehaved (with <ab>loc.</ab>); असाधुर्मातरि <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--4@} Corrupt, not properly formed or {%Sanskrit%} (as a word). --ध्वी An unchaste woman. °ता, --त्वं Wickedness.
